backend/main.mo: Actor defining authorization, storage mixins, and numerous data types for user profiles, matchmaking, payments (Razorpay/Stripe), signaling, and active user tracking with various ordered maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying TURN‑only WebRTC updates and listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing their functionality and UI behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with routes, themed layout, background visuals, and authentication‑aware loading of pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with cat‑themed visuals, attribution link, and simple navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, active user counter, authentication controls, and navigation menus.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Thin wrapper rendering the onboarding WelcomeAccountSetup component.
frontend/src/components/RazorpayConfigMo: Modal allowing admins to configure Razorpay API keys with validation, status alerts, and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigModa: Empty or placeholder file for Stripe configuration modal.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeAccountSe: Multi-step onboarding UI that collects profile and preference data, saves it via backend mutations, and navigates the user after completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and updates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, manages login flow, stored identities, and exposes login/clear methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, subscriptions, friends, KYC, and signaling operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRTC.ts: Implements a full WebRTC connection manager with TURN-only ICE config, signaling integration, retries, diagnostics, and media handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeIFramePlaye: Loads the YouTube IFrame API and manages a player instance with play, pause, seek, events, and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup, light/dark theme variables, custom animations, and accessibility/contrast utilities.
frontend/src/lib/youtube.ts: Provides helpers to parse YouTube URLs or IDs and generate embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Implements friends list UI with chat, calls, and navigation to view-together.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen handling login, user profile checks, and navigation to matching or onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/MatchingPage.tsx: Handles voice matching flow, WebRTC connection state, and profile/subscription checks.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays payment failure reasons with guidance and retry/navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Razorpay payment via URL params, refreshes subscription data, and displays success or error states with feature activation UI.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Loads and edits user profile data, saves updates, and allows triggering KYC verification.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Displays subscription plans and handles Razorpay order creation, payment flow, and verification.
frontend/src/pages/ViewTogetherPage.tsx: Synchronizes shared YouTube playback between peers using backend session state and an embedded IFrame player.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, TURN-only WebRTC requirement status, and current feature request tracking.
